title: Project-Based Instructional Design for Enhancing Psychological Processes and Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental psychology concepts and organizational work experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices, work-focused training for professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze complex workplace problems by applying structured thinking frameworks
Learners can explain how social experiences (positive/negative) influence individual psychological processes (personal resolve, effective functioning, personal effort)
Learners can design motivation and engagement strategies to improve adaptive performance (task efficiency, creative problem-solving) within organizations by at least 20%
Learners can visualize and evaluate causal relationships in instructional design based on structural equation modeling
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
